name: df-syms
body: |- wceq(csyms, cab(s0, wbr(ccnv(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cssr, cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the class of all symmetric sets. It is used only by ~ df-symrels . Note the similarity of the definitions ~ df-refs , ~ df-syms and ~ df-trs , cf. the comment of ~ dfrefrels2 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 19-Jul-2019.)
